mapper.select: select distinct f.id ,f.parent_id, f.name ,f.url ,f.perms,f.type,f.icon,f.order_num,f.open_mode from sys_user a inner join sys_dept b on a.dept_id=b.id inner join sys_user_role c on a.id=c.user_id inner join sys_role d on c.role_id=d.id inner join sys_role_menu e on d.id=e.role_id inner join sys_menu f on e.menu_id=f.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
